sect1.title: Usage
sect1.para: vtkImageNoiseSource just produces images filled with noise. The only option now is uniform noise specified by a min and a max. There is one major problem with this source. Every time it executes, it will output different pixel values. This has important implications when a stream requests overlapping regions. The same pixels will have different values on different updates.
To create an instance of class vtkImageNoiseSource, simply invoke its constructor as follows obj = vtkImageNoiseSource

sect1.title: Methods
sect1.para:
